events.message: I recently received my order but it is not what I expected and I want to return it for a full refund. The product does not match the description on the website.
The case was classified under the Refund category after analyzing the customer's request for returning the product and obtaining money back.
A customer support agent was assigned to handle the refund request following the case classification.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to return your order and get a refund. Let me assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and explain why the product didn't meet your expectations so I can process the return?
My order number is 123456789, and the product was the wrong size and style compared to what was shown on the website photos and description.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the return process and you will receive a prepaid shipping label shortly. Once we receive the item, we will issue a full refund.
That sounds good, thank you for the prompt response and clear instructions. I will send the product back as soon as I receive the label.
We have sent you the prepaid return label via email. Please use it to return the product, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after receipt.
Just following up to check if you have received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the item yesterday. Looking forward to the refund. Thanks again for your help.
The returned product was received and inspected. A full refund has been processed and credited to your original payment method. Closing this case now.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email to gather feedback on your refund experience with our support team.
